swagger-ui-key.description: This just defines what the Swagger-UI does so it has to be supported. The preferred method is to pass in the JWT token as a bearer token in the Authorization header.
swagger-ui-key.name: api_key

get.description: Get information about the game configuration

304.description: It's a normal empty 304, but swagger can't understand that

default.description: Any kind of error, not just an internal error

get.description: Returns all your inventories. This might change if it gets too expensive. It's not currently paginated.

default.description: Any kind of error, not just an internal error
